title: Boogie Board 10.5 Inch LCD Writing Tablet (Black)
description: Say Goodbye to Paper! The Boogie Board 10.5 inch LCD writing tablet is Ultra light (8.1 oz.) and thin (1/4"). The Boogie Board 10.5 tablet gives you more room to write important messages, solve complex equations or create a masterpiece. Your young student will also like the extra space for writing, arithmetic and drawing practice. The Boogie Board tablet's pressure-sensitive LCD writing surface creates lines of different thickness based on how hard you push - just like paper and pen!
